elements.name: Verify user can log in with valid credentials

steps.name: the user is on the login page
the user enters a valid email
the user enters a valid password
the user clicks the login button
the user should be redirected to the dashboard

name: To Check the 1-2 Taste Application Login Functionality

elements.name: Add/Edit a Billing address and ensure successful update

steps.name: User is logged in to the application and is redirected to the dashboard
User clicks on the Address menu and navigates to the Billing Address page
User fills in the Billing Address fields with valid data
User clicks the Save Address button
User should see a confirmation message.

elements.name: Add/Edit a Shipping address and ensure successful update

steps.name: User is logged in to the application and is redirected to the dashboard
User clicks on the Address menu and navigates to the Shipping Address page
User fills in the Shipping Address fields with valid data
User clicks the Save Address button
User should see the confirmation message

name: Address Management for Billing and Shipping

elements.name: Search for a valid product and apply random filters

steps.name: User is on the search page
User searches for a valid product
User selects random one from Application Area
User selects Best Selling from Default Sorting
User selects random Dietary Certification filters
User selects random Labels & Marks filters
User applies the filters
User should see relevant search results

name: To Check the 1-2 Taste Application Search Functionality

elements.name: Add a product to the cart

steps.name: User navigate to the product listing page
User increase the quantity using the plus button
User click on the Add to Cart button
User should see a confirmation message with the product name
the product should be added to the cart

name: To Check then 1-2 taste Application Add to Cart Functionality

elements.name: Verify user can log out with valid credentials

steps.name: the user logs into the application
the user clicks the center not username logout button
the user should be redirected to the login page
the user logs into the application again
the user clicks the side module logout button
the user should be redirected to the again login page

name: To Check the 1-2 Taste Application Log Out Functionality

elements.name: Verify user can Registartion with his details

steps.name: the user is on the registration page
the user enters as first name
the user enters last name
the user enters as email
